education.title: M.S Computer Graphics Technology (UX Design)
education.body2: Key Coursework: Design Theory, Qualitative Research Methods, Cognition & HCI, User Experience Studio

education.title: B.S Computer Science
education.body2: Key Coursework: Human-Computer Interaction, Software Engineering, Network-Centric Computing, Computer Vision, Deep Learning

positions.title: Design Engineer - Intern
positions.body: Designed and implemented responsiveness for the OneSignal dashboard and website; Created reusable and extendable Figma components for OneSignal's Journey's feature; Updated previews for latest MacOS notifications on desktop.

positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant
positions.body: Working with Dr. Paul Parsons as a UX consultant and researcher for Science Gateways Communtity Institute (SGCI) projects.

positions.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
positions.body: Lecturing students on basic web development with HTML, CSS and Javascript. Mentoring student course projects. Supervising and grading lab assignments. Providing regular tutorials/demos to build student expertise.

positions.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
positions.body: Worked in the Site Experience team. Major milestones: 90+ Google Lighthouse scores on non-paywalled pages; site-wide dark mode; custom Stale-While-Revalidate caching mechanism; Migration to new design system from legacy design; Admin Dashboard separation into Next.JS static app; Technical design reviewer.

positions.title: Technical Content Engineer
positions.body: Created 150+ interactive articles on various computer science concepts, algorithms, frameworks, libraries and technologies for Educative Answers.

positions.title: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
positions.body: As part of the Introductory Computer Science course, created weekly coding assignments for students. Supervised weekly 3-hour lab sessions, oversaw and graded final course projects.
